entities.name: madam rosmerta
entities.description: Madam Rosmerta is a person who runs the Three Broomsticks pub. She is described as shouting and forcibly ejecting a wizard.

entities.name: albus
entities.description: Albus is a wizard who is being ejected from the Three Broomsticks by Madam Rosmerta. He is described as being late and wanting to go to the Hog's Head for a quieter atmosphere.

entities.name: hog's head
entities.description: The Hog's Head is a pub where Albus wants to go for a quieter atmosphere. It is described as having an empty appearance compared to the Three Broomsticks.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a person who is guiding Harry through the Hog's Head pub without being seen. He is described as muttering and glancing around.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who is being guided by Dumbledore through the Hog's Head pub without being seen.

relationships.description: Madam Rosmerta ejects Albus from the Three Broomsticks.
Dumbledore guides Harry through the Hog's Head pub without being seen.
